Method Detail

getModalityForRoom

public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> getModalityForRoom(Room room,
                                                                                java.lang.String outputTypeURI)
query for the best modality to use based on the properties of the room and the type of message to get accross (question, reminder, statement, etc)

Parameters:
room - the room in which the user is currently in
outputTypeURI - the URI describing the type of output message
Returns:
a map containing the modalities and their ranking (higher value is better)

createRoomsFromRDF

public java.util.LinkedList<Room> createRoomsFromRDF()
Create a list of rooms based on the RDF model: Those are used to store the schedule.

Returns:
a list of Rooms
